Text.Page:
We know the argons are moving troops from here to the Khanovar Front, but not where the troops come from. Thanks to the intelligence you and Hasmina collected, we know how they're getting here.

And we're going to stop them."Oustanding! How?"
{@LinkCreature:76#1025} has concocted something for the occasion. He'll give you the details.

Take these bombs. Their power output is linked to the harmonics of the zolnaj transporters.

Make your way inside the {@Rgn:49004}, kill the guardian argons, and use the bombs. Nothing could be simpler.

Be careful. Fingers don't regrow themselves, you know.

Hey, reinforcements! How novel.

I tried to take out the transporter, but my weapons didn't do a blasted thing.

Get it? Blasted?

Anyway, watch yourself in there. It's crawling with argons.

Destroying that transporter will limit the argons' ability to reinforce their position in {@Rgn:48001}.

You bought us time.
